definition[0]: to give official permission for something
example[1]: Napoleon III authorized Haussmann to rebuild Paris.
definition[1]: to give official or legal permission for something
example[2]: The board has authorized the buy-back of 85,000 shares.
example[3]: The bill would authorize $850 million a year in grants to states to carry out school-improvement plans.
example[4]: The Food and Drug Administration authorized the company to restart production.
